text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Well then, we'll continue today's seminar 
from where we left off last time. First――
choice_data_list: Excuse me! Can I start off?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Oh? Is something wrong?
choice_data_list: ……I want to restate my determination

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh? ……Looks like you've had time to 
rethink things. Alright, let's hear it.

I need to put it in to words. I want to expand this dream. 
――――Just like her, fearless, straight-forward.

……I want to raise a strong Uma Musume. 
But not to raise just any strong Uma Musume.

To the rest of the world, Uma Musume that had 
great results in Classic Races, particularly the 
Derby Uma Musume, were rated highly. But, what if――

――there was an Uma Musume who wasn't able to run 
in the Japan Derby for some reason. Would that mean 
she wasn't as strong as the Derby Uma Musume?
――No. There was no way that was true.
choice_data_list: ……I will raise one, without a doubt――
……I will raise one, without a doubt――

text_block_list.text:
……I want to raise a strong Uma Musume. Even if 
they weren't able to run in the Classic Races――
choice_data_list: I want to break open a new path……

text_block_list.text:
I want them to leave a mark on history, regardless 
of what races they ran, to make everyone see their 
ability and recognize their strength.
choice_data_list: ――with an Uma Musume stronger than anyone!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
――Fufu, that's quite the dream. 
……But, it seems like there's much more heart in this one.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
In our line of work, dedication is required, and that kind 
of passion is equally as important. Don't forget your words 
just now, and I hope you continue to do your best from now on.
choice_data_list: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
――Oh man～, I didn't know you were the type to 
speak so strongly! Even in front of a veteran you 
were able to act as an equal, it was awesome!

text_block_list.name: Colleague Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. ……me too. It made me think I might be a little too unyielding. 
I think it was a good declaration of your determination.
choice_data_list: Thanks. But it's still only words

text_block_list.text:
Right. Now that it's been put in to words, I need 
to move towards making it real. And to do that――

――Several days later. I was going around 
the campus, looking for Bubble Gum Fellow.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Alright, guess I'll start――
choice_data_list: Bubble Gum Fellow!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Bubble Gum Beginner-san! 
…………Looks like something good happened, huh.
choice_data_list: Thanks to you, I was able to move forward
Thanks to you, I was able to move forward

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Because of me?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
『I want to raise an Uma Musume that will leave results 
that make everyone think she's the strongest ever』, huh?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I like it. 
I think it's a really cool dream.
choice_data_list: ……I couldn't say it out loud before

text_block_list.text:
『I'm still a rookie』『I'm too immature for a dream like this』 
That was how I thought, and I had closed off my own path forward.

But Bubble Gum Fellow had showed me. The only person that could 
decide how and when to make your dreams come true, was you yourself.
choice_data_list: That's why, I'm thankful

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Hahaa. It's fine, you don't need to thank me! That's the result of 
you stepping forward and taking hold of it yourself. Am I wrong?

Because Bubble Gum Fellow had said it so plainly…… 
I strongly felt that I wanted to lend her my strength.
choice_data_list: ……Will you let me help you?

text_block_list.text:
Ever since I saw her running with 
Symboli Rudolf, I had been thinking.

Bubble Gum Fellow could have an even more amazing race 
with Symboli Rudolf. And I wanted to see that myself――
choice_data_list: I want to help you win against her
I want to help you win against her

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Oooh. 
……You sound serious about this too.
choice_data_list: ……What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
…………for now, how about some gum? 
Let's talk while chewing.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
About how to proceed. 
――So that we can definitely win against Prez, right?
choice_data_list: ……! Yeah!
……! Yeah!

text_block_list.text:
And so, together with Bubble Gum Fellow, we decided 
to cooperate for the rematch against Symboli Rudolf――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……haa……――
choice_data_list: ――Good, we can up the pace here!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Okay……! Huu!

Bubble Gum Fellow responded to my 
signal and accelerated smoothly.

Then, after reaching a certain speed, she stopped accelerating and 
maintained her pace. There was no hesitation or uncertainty.
choice_data_list: (She really is amazing……!)

text_block_list.text:
As if she had her own built in speedometer, her run was immaculate. 
She had an incredible top speed and acceleration.

She had made it abundantly clear. 
Bubble Gum Fellow's running specs were top of the line.
choice_data_list: (But……something's missing……――)

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: And, how was it? Seeing my run again.
choice_data_list: There's so much potential! But――

text_block_list.text:
……Her running form was as clean as before. But, somehow, it felt 
like her run from before had more power and spirit behind it.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――From your perspective, I need some 
kind of 『Power』 to beat the Prez, right?
choice_data_list: ……I think it's important

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Okay. 
Then, let's do some training focusing on figuring that out.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Haa……haa……haa……!
choice_data_list: Okay, for the last 100m go all out!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Got it! 
――Haaaa!!
choice_data_list: (Her form looks good. So is her time――)

text_block_list.name: TV Voiceover
text_block_list.text:
『――Symboli Rudolf surges forward! Symboli Rudolf is 
in the lead! Symboli Rudolf crosses the goal!!』

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
No matter how many times I see it, it's amazing. 
That's some crazy finishing strength. ……To think 
I'd be facing someone like that again――
choice_data_list: …………It gets you motivated, right?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Really. During that parallel running when she 
passed me, I felt that too. ……Next time, I won't lose.
choice_data_list: (……Maybe her competitive spirit is――)

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
――Thanks for today! 
Parallel running with me was helpful!
choice_data_list: Good work. Here's a towel and water

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Thanks! How thoughtful of you. 
Then, let's review while hydrating.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……alright, looks like the promised day is approaching now. And? 
Have you figured out anything during the training so far?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I might have found something……!
Yeah, I might have found something……!

text_block_list.text:
Something that could draw out Bubble Gum Fellow's full strength 
and could be used to compete against Symboli Rudolf――
